Funds are required for a classified effort. Additional classified details will be provided under separate cover. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are available and early to need from Global Positioning System (GPS) III Space Segment program due to the realignment of Mission Success Incentive (MSI) payments from FY 2024 to FY 2025 to coincide with Space Vehicle (SV) 07 and 08 launches. The SV 07 launch was delayed from

Funds are available due to delays in execution from FY 2024 to FY 2025 for the Weapons System Trainer and Radio Frequency Countermeasures Engineer Change Proposal. There are no additional known requirements for the funding, and the funding is available to fund higher priority requirements. This funding source is not related to the $10.0 million FY 2024 congressional increase for MC-130J airborne mission networking upgrades. This is a congressional special interest item.
